oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Parlor analysis: parlor anatomy, basic system tests and how to perform this service
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Brennan, David T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: milking system
milk quality
parlor analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Milk quality on the dairy farm is influenced by the cow environment, the milkers, and the milking machine. A total milk quality program must therefore not overlook the milking system. The milking system can influence milk quality, bulk tank somatic cell counts, and clinical mastitis rates in many ways. Understanding what each part of the milking system does and how to test that it is functioning appropriately is key to providing milking system evaluation and milk quality troubleshooting services at your dairy practice.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2021 Recent Graduate Proceedings ; 58-60
